info.description: This is the API service for the Core Indexer project
info.title: Core Indexer API

get.description: Retrieve the average time taken to mine a block
Retrieve a list of NFT collections with optional search and pagination
Retrieve a list of NFT collections owned by a specific account address
get.summary: Get NFT collections by account address

parameters.description: Account address of the NFT owner
parameters.name: accountAddress

get.description: Retrieve a specific NFT collection by its collection address
get.summary: Get NFT collection by collection address

get.description: Retrieve activities related to a specific NFT collection with optional search and pagination
Retrieve the creator of a specific NFT collection by its address
Retrieve mutate events for a specific NFT collection by its address with pagination
Retrieve mint information for a specific NFT by its address
Retrieve mutate events for a specific NFT by its address with pagination
Retrieve transactions related to a specific NFT by its address with pagination

parameters.description: Whether to reverse the order of transactions
parameters.name: pagination.reverse

get.description: Retrieve a list of NFTs owned by a specific account address with optional search and collection filtering

parameters.description: Account address of the NFTs owner
parameters.name: accountAddress

get.description: Retrieve a list of NFTs by their collection address with optional search and pagination
Retrieve a specific NFT by its collection address and NFT address
get.summary: Get NFT by collection address and NFT address

get.description: Retrieve a list of transactions with pagination
Retrieve the total number of transactions
Retrieve transaction details by its hash
